overview: Emergency Sex brings us the most hunky chiselled men out there. Irish hunk Paddy O'Brian has been in a coma for some time and suddenly wakes up with his massive dick fully erect! The doctor, stud Dante Colle, comes rushing in to check out his vitals, but Paddy is so excited all he wants to do is get a blowjob and fuck a tight hole. What better way to check his vitals than by bending over doggy style and getting demolished. Meanwhile fit, bald-headed Orson Dean can't seem to stay out of trouble when it comes to dating. Tanned Louis is shocked to find them locking lips, and immediately calls Pietro downstairs so he can see what is going on. Gabriel suggests they all play together, and a hot orgy ensues.
title: Emergency Sex
